overview: Ah, for the life of a bodyguard... hanging around with power brokers and movie stars, shielding them from the prying eyes of the public, witnessing their most private moments. Go with one of Hollywood's hunkiest bodyguards as he fills us in on the secret desires of the hottest stars-- and fills a few of them himself!
tagline: He lives up to his name, In more ways than one.
title: Hard Bodyguard
